name: Enemies as Weapons
description:
A 2D space game where your ship was ambushed by space pirates. 

Your ship is a Cargo model with no weapons but has a tractor beam wich you can use to pick enemies and throw them at each other!

Survive for as long as possible and get the most kills!

Third party assets are limited to the background, and particle effects, and were  acquired through google with free to use licenses.
